body_html: Defining CUDA_NO_HALF_OPERATORS for cuda files should fix that, but it is already defined in CMakeLists https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/THC/CMakeLists.txt#L46, so I don't understand why you are seeing this. Try export TORCH_NVCC_FLAGS="-D__CUDA_NO_HALF_OPERATORS__" before building.
